title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the types of financial data to be audited, regulatory compliance standards, and desired outputs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, processing, analysis, reporting, and security. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, and performance requirements. Define data flows, interfaces, and integration points.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Module
description: Implement the module responsible for securely ingesting financial data from various sources.

title: Develop Data Processing and Analysis Module
description: Implement the module responsible for processing and analyzing the ingested financial data using AI algorithms.

title: Develop Reporting and Visualization Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating reports and visualizations based on the analysis results.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing financial data and audit results.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security and compliance standards for handling sensitive financial data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.
dependencies: Develop Data Processing and Analysis Module
Set up Database and Data Storage

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system meets requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
